title: Anarchism
description: Articles on anarchism, the struggle against Proudhon and the Conflict with Bakunin.

title: Art and Literature
description: Comprehensive index to references on art, literature, culture and literary criticism.

title: Britain
description: On the Cromwell and the English Revolution, Primitive Accumulation, the Industrial Revolution and the Condition of the Working Class, the Chartists, the English trade unions and British colonialism.

title: Economics
description: A collection of articles and books detailing a critique of capitalist political economy from the Manuscripts of 1844 through the various drafts of Das Kapital.

title: Education
description: Excerpts from Speeches and books by Marx, touching on education.

title: Environment
description: A collection of quotes from the Works of Marx and Engels on environment.

title: Ethics
description: Works of Marx & Engels, relevant to and most often quoted in relation to Ethics.

title: France
description: On French history and philosophy, the 1848 Uprising and the Paris Commune.

title: Free Trade
description: Speeches and Articles on Free Trade and Protectionism.

title: Historical Materialism
description: This compilation contains abstracts and links to over 30 books, documents and letters which uniquely highlight different aspects of the materialist conception of history.

title: India
description: Articles by Marx and Engels inNew-York Tribuneon the East India Company, mainly from 1853, the First Indian War of Independence, mainly from 1857, and selected letters between Marx and Engels concerning India and its history.

title: Interviews
description: Various media interviews on both Marx and Engels.

title: Ireland
description: Comprehensive collection of articles, letters and speeches on the Irish Question by Marx and Engels.

title: Letters to the Editor
description: Letters to bourgeois papers, usually in defence of prisoners or refuting slanders.

title: Literature
description: Early literary experiments of the young Marx and Engels.

title: Love and Marriage
description: Some excerpts from Marx, his beloved, Jenny, and his friend Engels, in their youth.

title: Newspapers
description: Articles Marx and Engels wrote for theNeue Rheinische Zeitungand other newspapers around the world.

title: Organisation
description: Speeches, manifestos & documents by Marx and Engels for the Communist League, the First International etc.

title: Philosophy
description: A collection begining with Marx’s youthful work on Greek Philosophy and his critique of Hegel to Engels’ popularisations of dialectics and materialism.

title: Poland
description: Speeches and Articles on Poland.

title: Pre-Capitalist Societies
description: Books and articles on early forms of society, the peasantry and ancient history.

title: Marx Quotes
description: A collection of famous quotes from the Works of Marx and Engels. With 130 quotes from Karl Marx, 30 quotes from Frederick Engels, and every quote linked to the context, this is the only genuine, reliable source of Karl Marx quotes on the internet.

title: Religion
description: Comprehensive index to references to Religion from the Works of Marx and Engels.

title: Russia
description: Articles and letters on “The Russian Menace” and the approaching Revolution in Russia, especially the prospects of the Russian village commune.

title: Science and Mathematics
description: Engels’ works on Natural Science, Marx’s Mathematical Manuscripts and other references to the sciences.

title: Speeches
description: Speeches by Marx and Engels on various struggles in which they were involved.

title: Trade Unions
description: Links to over 100 references on trade unions, strikes, etc 1844-1893.

title: War
description: Articles by Engels on War, Insurrection and Military Science.

title: Women
description: Karl Marx, mostly about exploitation of women, and Engels, mostly about origins of the family.
